title: Student Mobility Web Application
description: Development of a web application for student mobility using microservices architecture.

title: CI/CD Pipeline and Automation
description: Establishing a CI/CD pipeline for an application, integrating unit tests with Mock, automation via Jenkins, and deployment through Nexus and DockerHub. Includes testing with Postman and Swagger, and monitoring with Grafana and Prometheus.

title: Car Rental Mobile App
description: Development of an Android mobile app for car rental services using Java.

title: SPEEDSHOP E-Commerce Application
description: Development of an e-commerce web application with a focus on high-performance and scalability.
